tutorials.title: Data Science Service
tutorials.description: Introduction to the Data Science Service

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Sign Up for Free Trial Account
tutorials.description: Sign up for and log into the Oracle Cloud

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Configure the Data Science Service
tutorials.description: Configure the tenancy to work with the Data Science service.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create a Project
tutorials.description: Create a project to contain the Data Science Notebooks.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create and Open a Notebook Session
tutorials.description: Create a Notebook Session and launch it.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Accelerated Data Science SDK
tutorials.description: Introduction to the Accelerated Data Science SDK.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Installing the General Machine Learning Conda
tutorials.description: Configure the notebook session to install the General Machine Learning conda.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Binary Classification Model
tutorials.description: Learn about ADS using a binary classification model.

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Shutting Down a Notebook Session
tutorials.description: Deactivate or terminate a notebook session.
